formattedAddress: 56 Broadway 6th Floor, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 56 Broadway 6th Floor, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text: My daughter loved NYC Intern !!   Staff was friendly, great location, and the view and rooftop was amazing !  Target, Trader Joe's, and restaurants across the street. Subway access was close by. She is so glad she chose to live there. (Washer / Dryer was also very convenient ! ) She loved being able to come back to a clean, quiet, and amazing apt. Not a single complaint :)

originalText.text: Those negative reviews are not true nor the experience I had. My time at NYC intern was incredible. The staff quickly became like family! I always felt safe was so thankful to have central AC, free laundry in building as well as delivery notifications when I received a package. During the summer the maintenance team were actively making improvements to the building. On a couple of occasions, maintenance had to fix things in my apartment and did so in a timely manner - leaving the apartment clean like it never even happened, checking in later that day or the next in order to follow up on the fixes made. I have nothing but great things to say about NYC Intern, I would highly recommend to friends, family and college mates. I met some of my closest friends from living in this building — I am beyond grateful and will never forget my time here.

originalText.text: My daughter was in New York last summer and stayed in NYCIntern housing and loved it.  She was in a great building with a door man, great safe area and the building was nice, well kept and maintained.  She will be back in NYC this summer and just secured her housing with NYCIntern again - looking forward to a great summer!

She was in a great building with a door man, great safe area and the building was nice, well kept and maintained. originalText.text: Very very dissapointed in how NYCIntern is ran. When I moved in on my first day, the door wouldn't unlock. When they finally got the door unlocked they told me to leave it unlocked whenever I leave so I can get back in because they didn't have a fix until Tuesday (this was Saturday). They told me to leave my stuff unlocked and unprotected in my room when I was away. What the hell am I paying for if you leave my items open to the public and anyone can go into my room?? The AC also didn't work. Terrible service especially at such a steep price.
